sn56.131:1.1: … “Evameva kho, bhikkhave, appaka te satta ye pettivisaya cuta devesu paccajayanti; atha kho eteva bahutara satta ye pettivisaya cuta pettivisaye paccajayanti.
sn56.131:1.5: Dukkhassa ariyasaccassa, dukkhasamudayassa ariyasaccassa, dukkhanirodhassa ariyasaccassa, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya ariyasaccassa.
sn56.131:2.1: Tasmatiha, bhikkhave, ‘idam dukkhan’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhasamudayo’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhanirodho’ti yogo karaniyo, ‘ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada’ti yogo karaniyo”ti.
sn56.131:3.2: Attamana te bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandunti.
